name: Eustratios, Auxentius, Eugenius, Mardarius, and Orestes
martyr Lucia, Virgin
kontakia: (Tone 3) You shone, O victorious Martyr,* as a brilliant light for those sitting in the darkness of ignorance.* And armed with faith as with a lance, O Eustratios, most eloquent orator,* you feared not your enemiesâ€™ arrogance.
